thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 29 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Burckhardt Compression Holding FY Consolidated Net Income At CHF 29.0 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Burckhardt Compression Holding FY Consolidated Net Income At CHF 29.0 Mln
text:
May 29 (Reuters) - BURCKHARDT COMPRESSION HOLDING AG :
* FY GROUP SALES AT CHF 594.6 MN (PLUS 6.6%) * FY GROSS PROFIT OF CHF 125.1 MN WAS 4.2% BELOW FIGURE REPORTED FOR PY (CHF 130.5 MN)
* FY OPERATING INCOME AMOUNTED TO CHF 41.7 MILLION, DOWN CHF 6.0 MILLION ON PRIOR-YEAR FIGURE
* FY CONSOLIDATED NET INCOME AT CHF 29.0 MN, 10.6% LESS THAN IN PREVIOUS FISCAL YEAR
* OUTLOOK 2018: SALES EXPECTED TO MATCH 2017 LEVEL * OUTLOOK 2018: SEES SLIGHT INCREASE IN OPERATING INCOME AND NET PROFIT
* PROPOSES DIVIDEND OF CHF 6.00 PER SHARE (CHF 7.00 IN PREVIOUS YEAR) Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
